name: Brawling Bots
description:
Brawling Bots is a game based around combat robotics. Features of the game include:

  • 4 Robots to fight with or against - Launcher, Vertical Spinner, Hammer, Horizontal Spinner
  • Damage System
  • Local Multiplayer
  • AI
  • Tiebreaker System

It was a final year project made in 24 weeks in conjunction with other assignments. All 3D assets were made by myself, including the art.
